home.title: HealthCheck - Health and Fitness Calculators
home.description: Free health and fitness calculators for body fat, BMI, TDEE, and more
home.content: HealthCheck provides free health and fitness calculators to help you track and improve your health. Our calculators include BMI, body fat percentage, TDEE, calorie deficit, and more.

calculators.title: Calculator Categories
calculators.content: Explore HealthCheck calculators grouped by weight loss, body composition, nutrition, performance, wellness, pregnancy, and more.

calculator-widgets.title: Calculator Widgets
calculator-widgets.description: Embed HealthCheck calculators on your site with attribution
calculator-widgets.content: Embed HealthCheck calculators with an attribution link. Request approval, copy embed code, and publish the widget.

embed-terms.title: Embed Terms
embed-terms.description: Terms for embedding HealthCheck calculators on external websites
embed-terms.content: HealthCheck embed terms outline attribution requirements, allowed modifications, and acceptable use of embedded calculators.

learn.title: Health Guides
learn.description: Quick guides that explain key health metrics and link to the right calculators
learn.content: Health guides cover calorie basics, macro planning, heart rate training, body composition, walking and running energy, and pregnancy health.

learn-calorie-basics.title: Calorie Basics
learn-calorie-basics.description: How calories work for maintenance, loss, and gain
learn-calorie-basics.content: Calorie basics explains maintenance calories, calorie deficits, and how to set targets for weight loss or gain.

learn-macro-planning.title: Macro Planning
learn-macro-planning.description: Set carb, fat, and protein targets that align with your goals
learn-macro-planning.content: Macro planning helps you set protein, carb, and fat targets using HealthCheck nutrition calculators.

learn-heart-rate-training.title: Heart Rate Training
learn-heart-rate-training.description: Use zones and max heart rate to train smarter
learn-heart-rate-training.content: Heart rate training explains max HR, target zones, and resting heart rate to guide workouts.

learn-body-composition-guide.title: Body Composition Guide
learn-body-composition-guide.description: Understand BMI, body fat, and lean mass together
learn-body-composition-guide.content: Body composition guide connects BMI, body fat percentage, and lean body mass to assess health risk.

learn-walking-running-energy.title: Walking & Running Energy
learn-walking-running-energy.description: Estimate calories burned from walking or running
learn-walking-running-energy.content: Walking and running energy explains how speed, duration, and body weight affect calories burned.

learn-pregnancy-health.title: Pregnancy Health
learn-pregnancy-health.description: Key calculators for due dates and weight gain guidance
learn-pregnancy-health.content: Pregnancy health covers due dates, conception timing, and recommended weight gain ranges.

calculators-weight-loss.title: Weight Loss & Management Calculators
calculators-weight-loss.description: Plan sustainable fat loss with calorie, activity, and timeline tools.
calculators-weight-loss.content: Weight loss calculators to plan calorie deficits, fat loss timelines, and sustainable progress.

calculators-body-composition.title: Body Composition Calculators
calculators-body-composition.description: Understand body fat, shape, and healthy weight ranges with science-backed metrics.
calculators-body-composition.content: Body composition calculators for BMI, body fat percentage, ABSI, and waist-to-hip ratio.

calculators-metabolism-energy.title: Metabolism & Energy Calculators
calculators-metabolism-energy.description: Calculate calories burned at rest and across daily activity.
calculators-metabolism-energy.content: Metabolism calculators for BMR and TDEE to estimate daily energy needs.

calculators-nutrition.title: Nutrition & Macros Calculators
calculators-nutrition.description: Set protein and macro targets for weight loss, maintenance, or muscle gain.
calculators-nutrition.content: Nutrition calculators to plan macros and protein intake.

calculators-performance.title: Performance & Training Calculators
calculators-performance.description: Optimize workouts with pacing, heart rate, and strength tools.
calculators-performance.content: Performance calculators for heart rate zones, VO2 max, running pace, and strength.

calculators-wellness-recovery.title: Wellness & Recovery Calculators
calculators-wellness-recovery.description: Support hydration and sleep with daily recovery targets.
calculators-wellness-recovery.content: Wellness calculators for hydration and sleep planning.

calculators-pregnancy.title: Pregnancy & Fertility Calculators
calculators-pregnancy.description: Track due dates and ovulation windows with confidence.
calculators-pregnancy.content: Pregnancy calculators for due dates and ovulation tracking.

calculators-health-vitals.title: Health & Vitals Calculators
calculators-health-vitals.description: Monitor key vitals like blood pressure with clear categories.
calculators-health-vitals.content: Health calculators for blood pressure and vital monitoring.

calculators-utilities.title: Utility Calculators
calculators-utilities.description: Quick conversions for weight, height, and fitness-related units.
calculators-utilities.content: Utility tools for unit conversions used in health and fitness.

bmi.title: BMI Calculator
bmi.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) to assess your weight relative to your height
bmi.content: The Body Mass Index (BMI) calculator helps you assess your weight relative to your height. BMI is a widely used measure to identify possible weight problems in adults. It calculates your weight in kilograms divided by the square of your height in meters. While BMI doesn't directly measure body fat, it provides a reasonable estimate of body fat for most people and is used to categorize individuals as underweight, normal weight, overweight, or obese.

body-fat.title: Body Fat Calculator
body-fat.description: Calculate your body fat percentage using various methods including Navy method and skinfold measurements
body-fat.content: The Body Fat Calculator helps you estimate your body fat percentage using various methods including the Navy method, which uses waist, neck, and hip measurements. Body fat percentage is a better indicator of health than BMI as it distinguishes between fat mass and lean mass. Knowing your body fat percentage can help you set realistic fitness goals and track your progress over time.

army-body-fat.title: Army Body Fat Calculator
army-body-fat.description: Estimate body fat percentage using the U.S. Army circumference method
army-body-fat.content: The Army Body Fat Calculator estimates body fat using the U.S. Army circumference method. It uses waist, neck, height, and hip measurements to provide a quick screening estimate.

body-fat-burn.title: Body Fat Burn Calculator
body-fat-burn.description: Calculate calories burned during physical activities and estimate how long it will take to reach your weight loss goals
body-fat-burn.content: The Body Fat Burn Calculator helps you estimate how many calories you burn during various physical activities and how long it will take to reach your weight loss goals through exercise. By inputting your gender, age, height, weight, activity type, duration, and frequency, you can get a personalized estimate of your calorie expenditure and fat loss timeline.

tdee.title: TDEE Calculator
tdee.description: Calculate your Total Daily Energy Expenditure to determine how many calories you burn each day
tdee.content: The TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) Calculator helps you determine how many calories you burn each day based on your age, gender, height, weight, and activity level. TDEE includes your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) plus additional calories burned through physical activity and digestion. Knowing your TDEE is essential for weight management, as it represents your maintenance calories.

calorie.title: Calorie Calculator
calorie.description: Estimate your daily calorie needs for maintenance, weight loss, or muscle gain
calorie.content: The Calorie Calculator estimates your daily calorie needs based on age, sex, height, weight, and activity level. It provides maintenance calories plus targets for weight loss or gain. Use the results as a starting point and adjust based on real-world progress.

calories-burned.title: Calories Burned Calculator
calories-burned.description: Estimate calories burned from workouts using weight, duration, and activity
calories-burned.content: The Calories Burned Calculator estimates how many calories you burn during an activity based on MET values, weight, and time. Use it to compare workouts and plan energy expenditure.

calories-burned-walking.title: Calories Burned Walking Calculator
calories-burned-walking.description: Estimate calories burned from walking based on speed and duration
calories-burned-walking.content: The Calories Burned Walking Calculator estimates energy expenditure based on walking speed, time, and body weight.

calories-burned-running.title: Calories Burned Running Calculator
calories-burned-running.description: Estimate calories burned from running based on speed and duration
calories-burned-running.content: The Calories Burned Running Calculator estimates energy expenditure based on running speed, time, and body weight.

calories-burned-cycling.title: Calories Burned Cycling Calculator
calories-burned-cycling.description: Estimate calories burned from cycling based on speed and duration
calories-burned-cycling.content: The Calories Burned Cycling Calculator estimates energy expenditure based on cycling speed, time, and body weight.

calories-burned-swimming.title: Calories Burned Swimming Calculator
calories-burned-swimming.description: Estimate calories burned from swimming based on intensity and duration
calories-burned-swimming.content: The Calories Burned Swimming Calculator estimates energy expenditure based on swim intensity, time, and body weight.

steps-to-calories.title: Steps to Calories Calculator
steps-to-calories.description: Estimate calories burned from steps using stride length and duration
steps-to-calories.content: The Steps to Calories Calculator estimates calorie burn based on steps, stride length, duration, and body weight.

calorie-deficit.title: Calorie Deficit Calculator
calorie-deficit.description: Calculate your optimal calorie deficit for weight loss and estimate how long it will take to reach your goal
calorie-deficit.content: The Calorie Deficit Calculator helps you determine the optimal calorie deficit for weight loss based on your current weight, goal weight, and timeline. A calorie deficit occurs when you consume fewer calories than your body burns, leading to weight loss. This calculator helps you create a sustainable plan that balances effective weight loss with proper nutrition.

weight-management.title: Weight Management Calculator
weight-management.description: Plan your weight loss or gain journey with a target date and get a personalized calorie plan
weight-management.content: The Weight Management Calculator helps you plan your weight loss or gain journey with a target date. By entering your current weight, goal weight, and target date, you'll get a personalized calorie plan that tells you exactly how many calories to consume each day to reach your goal. The calculator ensures your plan is realistic and healthy.

maximum-fat-loss.title: Maximum Fat Loss Calculator
maximum-fat-loss.description: Calculate the maximum rate of fat loss possible based on your current body fat percentage
maximum-fat-loss.content: The Maximum Fat Loss Calculator helps you determine the maximum rate of fat loss that is physiologically possible based on your current body fat percentage and weight. This calculator uses research-based formulas to ensure your weight loss goals are realistic and sustainable, preventing muscle loss and metabolic adaptation.

absi.title: ABSI Calculator
absi.description: Calculate your A Body Shape Index (ABSI) to assess health risk based on waist circumference relative to BMI
absi.content: The ABSI (A Body Shape Index) Calculator helps you assess your health risk based on your waist circumference relative to your BMI and height. ABSI is a newer metric that may better predict mortality risk than BMI alone, particularly for individuals with central obesity. A higher ABSI indicates a more concentrated weight around the waist and potentially higher health risks.

whr.title: Waist-to-Hip Ratio Calculator
whr.description: Calculate your Waist-to-Hip Ratio (WHR) to assess your body fat distribution and health risk
whr.content: The Waist-to-Hip Ratio (WHR) Calculator helps you assess your body fat distribution and associated health risks. WHR is calculated by dividing your waist circumference by your hip circumference. A higher ratio indicates more fat stored around the waist ('apple shape'), which is associated with a higher risk of heart disease and type 2 diabetes compared to fat stored around the hips ('pear shape').

waist-to-height-ratio.title: Waist-to-Height Ratio Calculator
waist-to-height-ratio.description: Calculate your waist-to-height ratio to assess central body fat
waist-to-height-ratio.content: The Waist-to-Height Ratio Calculator compares your waist circumference to your height to assess central body fat. A waist less than half your height is a common guideline. Use this ratio with other metrics like BMI and body fat percentage.

body-frame-size.title: Body Frame Size Calculator
body-frame-size.description: Estimate body frame size from wrist circumference and height
body-frame-size.content: The Body Frame Size Calculator uses wrist circumference and height to classify small, medium, or large frame size.

adjusted-body-weight.title: Adjusted Body Weight Calculator
adjusted-body-weight.description: Estimate adjusted body weight using ideal body weight and actual weight
adjusted-body-weight.content: The Adjusted Body Weight Calculator uses the Devine formula for ideal body weight and adjusts based on actual weight.

conversions.title: Health and Fitness Conversions
conversions.description: Convert between different units of measurement for weight, height, and more
conversions.content: The Health and Fitness Conversions calculator helps you convert between different units of measurement commonly used in health and fitness contexts. Convert between metric and imperial units for weight (kg/lb), height (cm/ft/in), and more. This tool is useful for international users and for understanding measurements in different systems.

age.title: Age Calculator
age.description: Calculate your exact age in years, months, and days
age.content: The Age Calculator determines your exact age in years, months, and days based on your birth date. You can also choose a reference date to calculate your age at any point in time.

steps-to-miles.title: Steps to Miles Calculator
steps-to-miles.description: Convert steps into miles or kilometers
steps-to-miles.content: The Steps to Miles Calculator converts step counts into miles or kilometers using stride length.

macro.title: Macro Calculator
macro.description: Calculate macro targets based on calories and nutrition goals
macro.content: The Macro Calculator helps you break daily calories into protein, carbohydrate, and fat targets based on your goal. It is useful for meal planning and body composition goals.

carb-intake.title: Carb Intake Calculator
carb-intake.description: Calculate daily carbohydrate intake from calories and targets
carb-intake.content: The Carb Intake Calculator converts your calorie target and carb percentage into daily grams of carbohydrates.

fat-intake.title: Fat Intake Calculator
fat-intake.description: Calculate daily fat intake from calories and targets
fat-intake.content: The Fat Intake Calculator converts your calorie target and fat percentage into daily grams of fat.

protein.title: Protein Intake Calculator
protein.description: Estimate daily protein needs based on body weight and goals
protein.content: The Protein Intake Calculator estimates how much protein you need daily based on body weight, activity level, and goals.

one-rep-max.title: One Rep Max Calculator
one-rep-max.description: Estimate your one rep max strength from submaximal lifts
one-rep-max.content: The One Rep Max Calculator estimates your maximum lift using common strength formulas.

ideal-weight.title: Ideal Weight Calculator
ideal-weight.description: Estimate your ideal weight range using common formulas
ideal-weight.content: The Ideal Weight Calculator estimates a healthy weight range based on height and gender using multiple formulas.

body-surface-area.title: Body Surface Area Calculator
body-surface-area.description: Calculate body surface area from height and weight
body-surface-area.content: The Body Surface Area Calculator estimates your total body surface area based on height and weight. BSA is commonly used in clinical settings for medication dosing and health assessments.

lean-body-mass.title: Lean Body Mass Calculator
lean-body-mass.description: Estimate lean body mass based on height, weight, and sex
lean-body-mass.content: The Lean Body Mass Calculator estimates how much of your weight is lean tissue. Use it to track progress beyond scale weight.

heart-rate-zones.title: Heart Rate Zones Calculator
heart-rate-zones.description: Calculate training zones using percent max or Karvonen method
heart-rate-zones.content: The Heart Rate Zones Calculator provides target training zones based on age and optional resting heart rate.

max-heart-rate.title: Max Heart Rate Calculator
max-heart-rate.description: Estimate max heart rate with popular formulas
max-heart-rate.content: The Max Heart Rate Calculator estimates HRmax using common formulas like 220 minus age and Tanaka.

target-heart-rate.title: Target Heart Rate Calculator
target-heart-rate.description: Calculate target heart rate ranges for cardio training
target-heart-rate.content: The Target Heart Rate Calculator estimates training zones based on your age and optional resting heart rate.

resting-heart-rate.title: Resting Heart Rate Calculator
resting-heart-rate.description: Classify resting heart rate and fitness level
resting-heart-rate.content: The Resting Heart Rate Calculator classifies resting heart rate and provides context on cardiovascular fitness.

water-intake.title: Water Intake Calculator
water-intake.description: Estimate daily hydration needs based on weight and activity level
water-intake.content: The Water Intake Calculator estimates daily water intake targets based on body weight and activity level.

sleep.title: Sleep Calculator
sleep.description: Find ideal bedtimes or wake times based on sleep cycles
sleep.content: The Sleep Calculator suggests bedtimes or wake times aligned to 90-minute sleep cycles.

blood-pressure.title: Blood Pressure Calculator
blood-pressure.description: Check your blood pressure category from systolic and diastolic readings
blood-pressure.content: The Blood Pressure Calculator classifies readings into normal, elevated, or hypertension ranges.

bmr.title: BMR Calculator
bmr.description: Calculate basal metabolic rate with popular formulas
bmr.content: The BMR Calculator estimates the calories your body burns at rest using multiple formulas.

vo2-max.title: VO2 Max Calculator
vo2-max.description: Estimate VO2 max using the Rockport 1-mile walk test
vo2-max.content: The VO2 Max Calculator estimates cardiovascular fitness from a 1-mile walk time and heart rate.

running-pace.title: Running Pace Calculator
running-pace.description: Calculate pace per mile or kilometer plus speed
running-pace.content: The Running Pace Calculator converts distance and time into pace per mile, pace per kilometer, and speed.

pregnancy-due-date.title: Pregnancy Due Date Calculator
pregnancy-due-date.description: Estimate pregnancy due date from last period or conception date
pregnancy-due-date.content: The Pregnancy Due Date Calculator estimates due date using last menstrual period or conception date.

due-date-by-conception.title: Due Date by Conception Calculator
due-date-by-conception.description: Estimate pregnancy due date from conception date
due-date-by-conception.content: The Due Date by Conception Calculator estimates due date by adding 38 weeks to the conception date.

pregnancy-weight-gain.title: Pregnancy Weight Gain Calculator
pregnancy-weight-gain.description: Estimate recommended pregnancy weight gain ranges
pregnancy-weight-gain.content: The Pregnancy Weight Gain Calculator provides guideline ranges based on pre-pregnancy BMI.

ovulation.title: Ovulation Calculator
ovulation.content: The Ovulation Calculator estimates ovulation date and fertile window based on cycle length.

blog.title: Health and Fitness Blog
blog.description: Articles and guides on health, fitness, nutrition, and weight management
blog.content: The HealthCheck blog provides evidence-based articles and guides on health, fitness, nutrition, and weight management. Our content is written by health professionals and fitness experts to help you make informed decisions about your health and fitness journey.

blog-tdee-explained.title: TDEE Explained: How Many Calories Do You Really Need?
blog-tdee-explained.description: Understand the components of Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE), how it's calculated, and why knowing your TDEE is crucial for effective weight management.
blog-tdee-explained.content: Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) represents the total number of calories your body burns in a day. It consists of your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR), the energy used during physical activity, and the thermic effect of food. Understanding your TDEE is crucial for effective weight management as it helps you determine how many calories you need to maintain, lose, or gain weight. This article explains the components of TDEE, how it's calculated, factors that affect it, and how to use this knowledge for your health and fitness goals.

blog-calorie-deficit-myths.title: 5 Myths About Calorie Deficits Debunked
blog-calorie-deficit-myths.description: Discover the truth behind common misconceptions about calorie deficits, weight loss, and metabolism. Learn why weight loss isn't always linear and how to set realistic expectations.
blog-calorie-deficit-myths.content: Calorie deficits are essential for weight loss, but there are many myths and misconceptions surrounding them. This article debunks five common myths about calorie deficits: that extreme deficits lead to faster results, that metabolism permanently slows down during weight loss, that starvation mode will prevent weight loss, that weight loss should be linear, and that all calories are equal. Understanding the truth behind these myths can help you create a more effective and sustainable weight loss plan.

blog-measuring-body-fat.title: The Pros and Cons of Different Body Fat Measurement Methods
blog-measuring-body-fat.description: Compare the accuracy, accessibility, and practicality of various body fat assessment techniques, from DEXA scans to skinfold calipers to Navy method measurements.
blog-measuring-body-fat.content: Measuring body fat percentage can be done through various methods, each with its own advantages and limitations. This article compares different body fat measurement techniques including DEXA scans, hydrostatic weighing, air displacement plethysmography (Bod Pod), bioelectrical impedance analysis, skinfold calipers, and the Navy method. It discusses the accuracy, accessibility, cost, and practicality of each method to help you choose the most appropriate approach for your needs.

blog-understanding-absi.title: Understanding ABSI: A Better Measure of Body Shape
blog-understanding-absi.description: Learn about A Body Shape Index (ABSI) and why it might be a better predictor of health risks than BMI, especially for assessing central obesity.
blog-understanding-absi.content: A Body Shape Index (ABSI) is a relatively new metric that aims to improve upon the limitations of BMI by incorporating waist circumference relative to height and weight. This article explains what ABSI is, how it's calculated, and why it may be a better predictor of mortality risk than BMI alone, particularly for individuals with central obesity. It also discusses how to interpret your ABSI score and how to use this information to assess and improve your health.

blog-understanding-body-fat-percentage.title: Understanding Body Fat Percentage: What the Numbers Really Mean
blog-understanding-body-fat-percentage.description: Learn how to interpret body fat percentage measurements and what they mean for your health and fitness goals.
blog-understanding-body-fat-percentage.content: Body fat percentage is a key indicator of health and fitness that measures the proportion of fat mass to total body mass. This article explains what body fat percentage means, healthy ranges for men and women, the difference between essential fat and storage fat, and how body fat percentage relates to health and fitness goals. It also discusses how to interpret your body fat percentage results and set realistic goals based on your current level.

blog-waist-to-hip-ratio-guide.title: Waist-to-Hip Ratio Guide: What It Means for Your Health
blog-waist-to-hip-ratio-guide.description: Understand waist-to-hip ratio (WHR) and its significance for assessing health risks related to body fat distribution.
blog-waist-to-hip-ratio-guide.content: Waist-to-Hip Ratio (WHR) is a simple measurement that can provide valuable insights into your health risks based on how your body fat is distributed. This article explains what WHR is, how to measure it accurately, healthy ranges for men and women, and the health implications of different body shapes ('apple' versus 'pear'). It also discusses strategies for reducing WHR and improving overall health through diet, exercise, and lifestyle changes.

about.title: About HealthCheck
about.description: Learn about our mission to provide accurate, evidence-based health and fitness calculators and information
about.content: HealthCheck is dedicated to providing accurate, evidence-based health and fitness calculators and information to help you make informed decisions about your health. Our team of health professionals and fitness experts develops and reviews all content to ensure it meets the highest standards of accuracy and reliability.

contact.title: Contact HealthCheck
contact.description: Get in touch with the HealthCheck team for questions, feedback, or collaboration opportunities
contact.content: Have questions, feedback, or collaboration opportunities? Get in touch with the HealthCheck team through our contact form. We value your input and are committed to continuously improving our calculators and content based on user feedback.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: HealthCheck's privacy policy explaining how we collect, use, and protect your data
privacy.content: HealthCheck's privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy outlines our practices regarding data collection, usage, and your rights concerning your information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: HealthCheck's terms of service outlining the rules and guidelines for using our website and calculators
terms.content: HealthCheck's terms of service outline the rules and guidelines for using our website and calculators. By using our services, you agree to these terms, which include information about acceptable use, intellectual property, disclaimers, and limitations of liability.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Important information about the limitations of HealthCheck's calculators and content
disclaimer.content: HealthCheck's medical disclaimer provides important information about the limitations of our calculators and content. Our tools and information are for educational purposes only and are not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before making any health-related decisions.
